title: U.S. Treasury Secretary Bessent Calls Corrections Normal, Suggesting a Higher Pain Threshold for the 'Trump Put'
body: On Sunday, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent described asset market corrections as healthy, suggesting a greater tolerance for pain before the much-anticipated policy support or the so-called 'Trump put" for the market, is enacted. "I’ve been in the investment business for 35 years, and I can tell you that corrections are healthy, they are normal,” Bessent said Sunday on NBC’s Meet The Press, according to Bloomberg . “I‘m not worried about the markets. Over the long term, if we put good tax policy in place, deregulation and energy security, the markets will do great.” Bessent's comment contradicts popular belief that the Trump administration will quickly douse any fire stemming from the administration's policy moves, particularly trade tariffs. President Donald Trump also recently clarified his stance, saying he is not looking at the stock market. Wall Street's tech-heavy index, Nasdaq, and the S&P 500 entered correction last week, falling over 10% from their February highs predominantly on concerns that Trump's tariffs could slow economic growth while leading to sticky inflation. Bitcoin (BTC), too, has taken a beating, down nearly 25% from the record highs above $109K in January, according to CoinDesk Indices data , tracking the risk-off on Wall Street and digesting disappointment over the absence of fresh BTC purchases under Trump's strategic digital assets reserve plan. The risk-off has revved up expectations of policy support from the government or the Federal Reserve (Fed), particularly in the crypto community. However, Bessent's take suggests that it may take longer to manifest or require more significant market declines before any action is taken. The Treasury secretary said last month that the Trump administration is focused on lowering the yield on the 10-year Treasury note, which influences most long-term loans in the economy. Meanwhile, Fed Chair Jerome Powell and his colleagues stressed early this month that they are watching to see the “net effects” of Trump's policies on the economy and are not in a hurry to cut rates. Officials will meet for a rate review this week, with the decision due Wednesday.

title: Smart Money Accumulation in the Last 24 Hours: AI, Gaming, MEME, and Real-World Asset Tokenization Lead the Way
body: For the past 24 hours, the segment of the cryptocurrency market that we might call the “ smart money ” has been showing quite the interest in certain stories and new projects. From Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Gaming, to the ongoing evolution of meme coins, we’ve been seeing some pretty significant wallet activity that signals a newfound confidence in these sectors. So, which projects might be driving this recent influx of confidence? And what stories are gaining traction in the decentralized space? Top Accumulations in the Last 24 Hours The last day has seen a significant accumulation across various sectors, with AI and gaming leading the charge in our inquiries. There are four key categories where we see substantial wallet activity: 1. AI-driven projects 2. AI agents 3. Real-World Asset Tokenization (RWA) 4. MEMEs (not what you might expect in a bear market, but here we are!) AI and Gaming: A Growing Trend One of the most remarkable accumulations was seen in $GAI, the token behind @GAI_meme, which serves as the first launchpad for Gaming AI Agents on Base. This platform enables AI to generate custom games, a feature that has drawn significant attention from developers and investors alike. In the past 24 hours, six smart money wallets have accumulated a total of $15,000 worth of $GAI tokens, reflecting a market cap of $153K. This level of interest suggests that there’s a growing excitement about the intersection of gaming and artificial intelligence—that investors are positioning themselves early in a sector that seems ripe for future growth. The concept of AI in gaming isn’t novel, but projects like $GAI are taking it to the next level, creating possibilities beyond what we could have envisioned until now. An emphasis on AI-powered, user-generated content is what could push the gaming world to real-time personalization of all things core to the gaming experience. If $GAI isn’t quite doing that yet, it’s at least setting the stage for an era where that becomes standard. AI Agents: The Future of Automation Trailing not far behind is $AIXCB—a project spearheaded by @aixbt_project. This platform, centered on AI-driven projects, is now in the sights of smart money investors. Three separate smart money wallets have recently accumulated 20k worth of tokens, which bumps this project’s market cap to $6.2 million. As you can see, this is hardly a top project in the crypto market, but it is gaining attention—rightly so, in my opinion, because AI is the dominant theme in the crypto space right now and is a much-discussed area of research. The infusion of AI into the cryptocurrency network, especially with the creation of AI agents, has the chance to effect a paradigm shift. These autonomous agents can handle jobs, make decisions, and even interact with decentralized protocols, all without any human oversight. And that is exactly what has investors so interested in this development—because it has the potential to make decentralized networks vastly more efficient, scalable, and secure. Real-World Asset Tokenization: Bridging Traditional and Blockchain Finance Smart money is also pouring into Real World Asset (RWA) Tokenization, with $WHITE, the token for @WhiteRock_Fi, seeing a strong accumulation. This project aims to bridge the gap between traditional finance and blockchain by having a tokenization solution for real-world assets. One wallet that is obviously very smart has accumulated $9,500 worth of $WHITE tokens, and this project is now rocking a $586 million market cap. Smart money wallets accumulations in the last 24 hours Main specific narratives accumulated: AI and Gaming (10 wallets) AI Agents (6 wallets) Real-World Asset Tokenization (3 wallets) MEME (2 wallets) Top accumulations and reasoning: $GAI -> @GAI_meme is the… pic.twitter.com/nw3gOkk62n — CoinSense.app (@CoinSense_App) March 14, 2025 RWA tokenization is the next logical step in blockchain maturation. It’s a way to represent real-world assets, like real estate or commodities, on the blockchain. This sector’s development seems sure to catch the eyes of institutional investors and other big capital pools. Benefits it offers include increased liquidity, easier transfer of ownership, and the possibility of fractional ownership. MEME Coins: The Resilience of Popular Culture Certainly, the MEME segment continues to be a substantial market participant, with astute capital wagering on the enduring nature of established communities. $PEPE, a highly popular meme coin with a substantial number of followers, had one such wallet accumulate $9,600 worth of tokens. This brought its market cap to $3.04 billion. Despite the origins of its name, $PEPE has also made substantial cultural inroads in the space, attracting real and virtual retail investors as well as institutional ones. Meme coins have shown to be sturdy for the most part. This sturdiness can be attributed mainly to two features: the community aspect and the viral potential that these coins usually have. Take, for example, $PEPE. This token, in my opinion, is one of the best tokens that you can find in the meme coin space. This is because this token has not only a dedicated fanbase but also something that is becoming increasingly evident—mainstream awareness. The Big Picture: Smart Money Shows Confidence in Diversified Sectors The recent gathering of funds across these four sectors–AI and gaming, AI agents, RWA tokenization, and MEME–shows that smart-money investors aren’t just in it for a quick return. They’re seeing long-term value in projects that are innovating in important spaces, from artificial intelligence to the old-school finance world meeting up with blockchain. With the development of AI and gaming projects and the tokenization of RWAs, the very exciting, rapidly growing transformations we are witnessing in decentralized finance are equally set to take place in traditional finance. Meme coins, as we say, in a world of unpredictability offer a kind of reliable unpredictability now. In a world where we can’t really know what anything is worth, the sustained interest in both IRL and digital tokens makes us sure they’re worth something. That sustained interest seems like too much fun to think what we might be really paying in the future to hold our place in the fun house. Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. title: Urgent Peace Talks? Trump-Putin Ukraine Discussion Sparks Crypto Market Hope
body: Hold onto your hats, crypto enthusiasts! The ever-dynamic world of cryptocurrency is once again bracing for potential ripples from global events. This time, it’s not about Elon Musk’s tweets or regulatory crackdowns, but something far more significant: a potential shift in the geopolitical landscape. Former U.S. President Donald Trump has announced his intention to speak with Russian President Vladimir Putin on March 18 to discuss ending the ongoing war in Ukraine. Could this conversation be a turning point, and what does it mean for your crypto portfolio? Let’s dive into the details and explore the potential market impact . Why Trump-Putin Peace Talks Matter for Cryptocurrency While seemingly distant from the digital currency realm, geopolitical events have a profound and often immediate impact on financial markets, and cryptocurrency is no exception. The Russia-Ukraine conflict has already demonstrated this, contributing to market volatility and influencing investor sentiment. A discussion aimed at resolving this conflict, especially one involving figures as prominent as Trump and Putin, injects a new element of uncertainty – or perhaps, hope – into the global equation. Here’s why this news is relevant to you as a crypto holder: Geopolitical Risk and Market Volatility: Cryptocurrency, while often touted as a hedge against traditional market instability, is not immune to broader geopolitical risk . Events like wars, political tensions, and international crises can trigger significant market fluctuations. Any perceived escalation or de-escalation in global conflicts directly affects investor confidence and risk appetite, leading to shifts in asset allocation. Global Stability and Investor Sentiment: Global stability is a cornerstone of healthy financial markets. Prolonged conflicts erode investor confidence, leading to risk-off behavior. Conversely, any indication of progress towards peace can boost market optimism. A Trump-Putin discussion, even if just a conversation, is being interpreted by some as a potential step towards de-escalation, which could positively influence market sentiment. Safe Haven vs. Risk Asset: The role of cryptocurrency as a safe haven asset is constantly debated. In times of extreme uncertainty, some investors flock to assets perceived as safe havens. However, during periods of heightened geopolitical risk , crypto can also behave like a risk asset, experiencing sell-offs alongside stocks and other volatile markets. The outcome of these peace talks could sway crypto’s perception and behavior in the short to medium term. Economic Fallout and Inflation: The Ukraine war has had significant global economic consequences, including supply chain disruptions and inflationary pressures. These factors directly influence monetary policy and investor decisions. Any progress towards peace could ease some of these pressures, potentially impacting inflation expectations and the broader economic outlook, which in turn affects cryptocurrency valuations. Decoding the Potential Market Impact of Trump-Putin Talks So, what kind of market impact can we anticipate from this Trump-Putin dialogue? Predicting market reactions with certainty is impossible, especially in the crypto space known for its volatility. However, we can consider a few potential scenarios: Scenario Potential Crypto Market Reaction Contributing Factors Optimistic Outcome (Perceived progress in peace talks) Positive – Potential price surge in major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum. Increased investor confidence and risk appetite. Positive news headlines, reduced geopolitical tensions, increased inflow of funds into risk assets. Neutral Outcome (Talks happen, but no immediate breakthroughs) Mixed/Neutral – Market may remain volatile but largely unchanged in the short term. Focus shifts back to other market drivers like inflation data and regulatory news. Uncertainty persists, market awaits concrete actions, other economic factors regain prominence. Pessimistic Outcome (Talks fail or escalate tensions) Negative – Potential price drop across crypto markets. Increased risk aversion, flight to safety towards traditional assets or stablecoins. Negative news flow, heightened geopolitical tensions, increased market fear and uncertainty. It’s crucial to remember that the crypto market is influenced by a multitude of factors. While the Trump-Putin discussion is a significant event, its market impact will be intertwined with other ongoing narratives, such as inflation rates, interest rate hikes, regulatory developments, and technological advancements in the crypto space itself. Navigating Geopolitical Risk in Your Crypto Strategy How can you, as a crypto investor, navigate this period of geopolitical risk and potential market volatility? Here are some actionable insights: Stay Informed: Keep a close watch on news related to the Ukraine war, the Trump-Putin discussion, and broader geopolitical developments. Reputable news sources and crypto market analysis platforms can provide valuable updates. Diversify Your Portfolio: Diversification is key in volatile times. Don’t put all your eggs in one basket. Consider diversifying across different cryptocurrencies and potentially allocating a portion of your portfolio to less volatile assets. Manage Risk: Understand your risk tolerance. Geopolitical events can trigger sharp market swings. Consider setting stop-loss orders or reducing your exposure if you are uncomfortable with high volatility. Long-Term Perspective: Remember that cryptocurrency is still a relatively young and evolving asset class. Short-term market fluctuations driven by geopolitical events are part of the journey. Maintain a long-term perspective and focus on the fundamental value and potential of your chosen crypto projects. Consider Stablecoins: In times of heightened uncertainty, stablecoins pegged to fiat currencies can offer a safe haven within the crypto ecosystem. They can be a useful tool to reduce volatility in your portfolio during turbulent periods. The Quest for Global Stability and its Crypto Connection The aspiration for global stability is not just a political ideal; it’s a fundamental prerequisite for sustained economic growth and healthy financial markets. The cryptocurrency market, while often seen as a disruptive force, is ultimately interconnected with the broader global economic and political landscape. Progress towards resolving conflicts like the war in Ukraine is a positive sign for overall global stability , and could create a more favorable environment for all asset classes, including cryptocurrency. The Trump-Putin discussion on March 18 is undoubtedly a noteworthy event. Whether it will lead to a significant breakthrough in the Ukraine conflict remains to be seen. However, its potential to influence market impact , investor sentiment, and the trajectory of the cryptocurrency market is undeniable. As crypto investors, staying informed, adapting to evolving geopolitical realities, and maintaining a balanced perspective are crucial in navigating these uncertain times. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Smart Money Flow in Memecoin Market on March 13, 2025: Outflows Outpace Inflows
body: Investor sentiment in the memecoin market shifted on March 13, 2025, as the smart money showed a net outflow of capital. This cautious approach of our major investors was further indicated by the inflows into only a few select memecoins. The overall trend here was definitely an outflow, which pointed towards an increasing appetite for something else outside of the memecoin space. Was it a movement back into Bitcoin? Was it major investors looking to route capital around into phase 2 of the next bull run? Whatever the reason, the nominal shift definitely took some wind out of the sails of the memecoin market. A Detailed Look at the Flow of Funds The memecoin market saw a total trading volume of $3.75 million on March 13, 2025, but this market experienced a very substantial net outflow of $1.8 million. And what was driving this outflow? Well, there was an outflow of $2.8 million and an inflow of just $958.1K. These figures suggest that the overall inclination of investors around that time was decidedly toward selling or trimming the memecoins they were holding. Although the overall trend is negative, some memecoins did see significant inflows, indicating that parts of the market are still attractive to investors. The memecoins attracting the most attention included $UFD, $SNAI, $PWEASE, #GRIFFAIN, and $BMT. Each of these tokens saw inflows in the range of $30,000 to $63,000, which suggests that some investors are making bets that these particular assets are either long-term plays or short-term trading opportunities. Memecoins Seeing Inflows: Speculative Moves and Hopes for Quick Returns The inflows were focused predominantly on just a few of the tokens that seem to have galvanized the memecoin community. For instance, $UFD saw inflows of $39.1K, while $SNAI was not far behind with $30.2K. Another clear standout was $PWEASE, the popular memecoin associated with U.S. Vice President JD Vance, which attracted a notable $63.3K in inflows—clearly riding the wave of a recent price uptick. Overall, the pretty clear takeaway here is that inflows are coming to the market and, at least for now, seem largely to be pumping up a handful of tokens that have found favor among the memecoin community. Recap:Smart money on chain activities in the memecoin market for 13/03/25 Yesterday, there was more outflow than inflow Inflow: $958.1k Outflow: $2.8M Volume: $3.75M Net Volume: -$1.8M There was inflow into: $UFD ($39.1K) $SNAI ($30.2K) $PWEASE ($63.3K) #GRIFFAIN ($50.9K)… pic.twitter.com/x8nUxUEsLk — Stalkchain (@StalkHQ) March 14, 2025 #GRIFFAIN and $BMT also saw some inflows, with $50.9K and $48.2K entering their respective markets. These tokens, while not as widely recognized as others in the memecoin space, appear to be gaining some attention from smart money, likely due to either their novelty or the speculative opportunities they present in the current market environment. This suggests that a subset of investors is willing to bet on the success of lesser-known memecoins in the hopes of achieving quick profits. Memecoins Seeing Outflows: Caution and Profit-Taking In contrast, there were many larger, more established memecoins that saw significant outflows. The largest outflow was associated with $FARTCOIN, which lost $1.4 million, indicating that investors were taking profits or battening down the hatches in anticipation of a possible market downturn. Other tokens that experienced net outflows included $ARC, with $227.3K bailing, and $FAT, which saw $57.9K leave its coffers. In the meantime, the infamous memecoins GIGA and WBTC had outflows too, but theirs was the smallest of the bunch at $53.8K and $187.4K. Still, these outflows from even more prominent memecoins suggest a more risk-averse attitude among investors, who might be worried about the sustainability of current price levels. The Bigger Picture: A Market in Flux The ner… and volatility; smart money flows are pointing to a more cautious outlook. Some tokens are still seeing investment, but the overall trend is toward outflows—indicating that some investors are either taking profits or pulling back on risk exposure. That is the kind of behavior you expect from a speculative market highly sensitive to short-term price movements. Over the next few weeks, we can expect the memecoin sector’s individual tokens to largely track overall market sentiment. If you think the meme token economy might be heading for a tropical paradise of community engagement and ongoing project hype, it’s still far from a certainty. Cryptos in the memecoin sector are well-known for their volatility. Even tokens that seem to be riding the meme wave well aren’t safe from sharp market corrections. As we progress further into 2025, it will be intriguing to observe whether this outflow trend persists or the market swings back to a more optimistic outlook, with cash again flowing into the memecoin domain. For the moment, the prevailing sentiment among investors who are almost surely of the “smart money” variety seems to favor sitting on the sidelines, with these individuals taking a “wait and see” stance on how the market develops in the near future. title: Groundbreaking South Korea Crypto Bill: Unleashing Corporate Investment in Bitcoin and Ethereum
body: Get ready for a potential game-changer in the crypto world! South Korea, a nation known for its tech-forward approach and vibrant cryptocurrency market, is taking a monumental step towards mainstream crypto adoption. A new bill has been introduced by the ruling People Power Party (PPP) that could dramatically alter the landscape of corporate crypto investment in the country. What does this mean for the future of digital assets in South Korea and beyond? Let’s dive into the details of this exciting development. What’s the Buzz About the South Korea Crypto Bill? For the first time in South Korea’s 22nd National Assembly, which commenced on May 30, 2024, a bill has been put forward to officially permit corporate crypto investment . This landmark legislation, championed by Jung Sung-kook of the ruling People Power Party (PPP), aims to amend the Financial Investment Services and Capital Markets Act. The core of the amendment lies in reclassifying virtual assets like Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) as legitimate ‘properties’ that asset management companies can invest in. This might sound like a technicality, but it’s a HUGE leap forward. Why is this reclassification so significant? Opening Doors to Institutional Money: By recognizing cryptocurrencies as investable properties, the bill paves the way for institutional investors and corporations to allocate funds into the crypto market through regulated channels. Facilitating Crypto ETFs: Perhaps the most anticipated outcome is the potential for spot crypto ETFs . Currently, South Korea, like many other regions, has been hesitant about approving spot Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs. This bill directly addresses this by making it legally feasible for asset managers to include these digital assets in ETF products. Boosting Market Confidence: Legal clarity and institutional participation often lead to increased market confidence. This move could signal to both domestic and international investors that South Korea is serious about embracing the future of finance. Unpacking Corporate Crypto Investment: Benefits and Challenges The prospect of allowing corporate crypto investment in South Korea brings with it a wave of potential benefits, but also some challenges that need careful consideration. Potential Benefits: Increased Liquidity and Market Depth: Corporate investment can inject significant capital into the crypto market, leading to higher liquidity and making it easier for traders to execute large orders without causing drastic price swings. Mainstream Adoption: When corporations start investing in cryptocurrencies, it sends a powerful signal of legitimacy to the broader public. This can accelerate mainstream adoption and integration of digital assets into the financial system. Innovation and Growth in the Crypto Ecosystem: Increased capital flow can fuel innovation within the crypto space. Companies may be more inclined to develop new products and services around cryptocurrencies, fostering growth and expansion of the ecosystem. Portfolio Diversification for Corporations: Cryptocurrencies, with their low correlation to traditional assets, can offer corporations a valuable tool for portfolio diversification, potentially enhancing returns and managing risk. Potential Challenges: Regulatory Oversight and Compliance: As corporate crypto investment grows, robust regulatory frameworks are essential to protect investors and prevent illicit activities. Ensuring compliance with evolving regulations can be complex for businesses. Volatility and Risk Management: The cryptocurrency market is known for its volatility. Corporations venturing into this space need to have robust risk management strategies in place to navigate price fluctuations and potential market downturns. Custody and Security Concerns: Safely storing and managing large amounts of cryptocurrency assets is a critical challenge for corporations. Secure custody solutions and robust security protocols are paramount to prevent theft and loss. Accounting and Tax Implications: The accounting and tax treatment of cryptocurrencies are still evolving in many jurisdictions. Corporations need clear guidelines and expertise to handle the financial reporting and tax obligations associated with crypto investments. Crypto ETFs: The Gateway to Broader Investment? The proposed bill is particularly exciting because of its potential to unlock crypto ETFs in South Korea. Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs) are investment vehicles that track the price of an underlying asset or index and are traded on stock exchanges. They offer a convenient and regulated way for investors to gain exposure to an asset class without directly owning the asset itself. Why are Crypto ETFs so sought after? Feature Spot Crypto ETFs Traditional Crypto Investment Accessibility Easily accessible through brokerage accounts, familiar to traditional investors. Requires setting up crypto exchange accounts and managing wallets, can be complex for newcomers. Regulation & Security Operates within established regulatory frameworks, offering investor protection. Regulation varies, security risks associated with self-custody and exchange vulnerabilities. Liquidity High liquidity due to exchange trading, easy to buy and sell. Liquidity can vary depending on the cryptocurrency and exchange. Tax Efficiency (Potentially) Tax treatment may be similar to traditional ETFs in some jurisdictions. Tax implications can be more complex and vary depending on the type of crypto transaction. If South Korea approves crypto ETFs , it could significantly broaden access to crypto investments for both retail and institutional investors. It would also align South Korea with other jurisdictions that are increasingly exploring and approving crypto ETFs, potentially boosting its competitiveness in the global digital asset market. Bitcoin Investment and Ethereum Investment: Leading the Charge The bill specifically mentions Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) as virtual assets eligible for corporate investment, recognizing their status as the two largest and most established cryptocurrencies by market capitalization. This focus on Bitcoin investment and Ethereum investment is strategic for several reasons: Market Dominance and Maturity: Bitcoin and Ethereum have demonstrated greater market resilience and maturity compared to many other cryptocurrencies. Their established track records make them more palatable for institutional investors seeking relatively lower-risk crypto exposure. Institutional Demand: There is significant pent-up institutional demand for Bitcoin and Ethereum. Many corporations and asset managers have expressed interest in allocating a portion of their portfolios to these digital assets, and this bill could provide the regulatory green light they’ve been waiting for. Foundation for a Broader Crypto Market: Starting with Bitcoin and Ethereum can serve as a solid foundation for gradually expanding corporate investment to other cryptocurrencies in the future, as the market matures and regulatory clarity improves. The potential influx of Bitcoin investment and Ethereum investment from corporations in South Korea could have a substantial positive impact on the prices and overall market sentiment for these leading cryptocurrencies. What’s Next? The introduction of this bill is a significant first step. It will now go through the legislative process, including committee reviews and votes in the National Assembly. While the bill is spearheaded by the ruling party, it will be crucial to watch for cross-party support and any potential amendments as it progresses. For crypto enthusiasts and investors, this development is undoubtedly exciting. It signals a potential shift in South Korea’s stance towards cryptocurrency regulation and could position the nation as a key player in the global digital asset landscape. Keep an eye on further updates as this groundbreaking bill moves through the legislative process! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption.

title: A whale is being ‘hunted down’ for short positioning over 5,400 BTC with 40x leverage
body: A whale on Hyperliquid has gone viral for starting a short position for around $450 million worth of Bitcoin. There is now an active ‘man-hunt’ to stop the perpetrator in its tracks. According to data on Hypurrscan, on Mar. 17 at 6:30 AM UTC, the whale just closed two positions through Time-Weighted Average Price or TWAP for a combined 208 BTC ( BTC ) at a price of $83,392. The total worth of both transactions is equal to more than $18 million. At 4:30 AM UTC, the anonymous trader added $7.5 million in collateral to their Bitcoin short position to avoid being liquidated by the margin on Hyperliquid. On-chain data shows that the trader has accumulated a loss of nearly $1.1 million from unrealized profit and loss or PNL. This whale still managed to turn a profit despite being hunted by a team! 11 hours ago, @Cbb0fe publicly formed a team to hunt this whale who shorted $BTC with 40x leverage. Just one hour later, the team was in action, driving $BTC above $84,690 in a short period. The whale… pic.twitter.com/D6FBOFikZR — Lookonchain (@lookonchain) March 17, 2025 At the moment, the trader’s current position stands at 5,167 BTC, with a value of around $429 million. The short position stands at 40x leverage and has an unrealized profit of $4 million. Simultaneously the trader also has a long position with 5x leverage for 571,715 MELANIA ( MELANIA ) valued at $390,000. You might also like: Binance adjusts leverage on multiple perpetual contracts, raising TRUMP to 50x The whale first started its enormous short position in Bitcoin on Mar. 16. At the time, a crypto trader on X with the username @Cbb0fe or CBB detected the whale’s suspicious activity and called for other traders to join a public manhunt to liquidate the whale’s position before it could cause more harm to the ecosystem. “If you are willing to hunt this dude with size, drop a DM, setting up a team right now and already got good size,” said CBB on their post . In a separate post, CBB told traders to message them with “7 figs size only” as the combined funds of the team had already exceeded eight figures. An hour after the team was formed, they managed to drive up the market price of Bitcoin from $83,183 to more than $84,690. As a result, the whale was forced to deposit $5 million in USDC ( USDC ) to increase its margin and avoid liquidation. However, the manhunt has yet to success as the whale continues to evade liquidation by boosting its position to short BTC through TWAP. Hyperliquid’s official account also recently commented on the viral bear trader’s activity on-chain, describing how the protocol has become synonymous with “the market” as it has garnered significant attention from the crypto community. “When a whale shorts $450M+ BTC and wants a public audience, it’s only possible on Hyperliquid,” wrote the account. Earlier this month, on March 12, a whale began a long position on Hyperliquid with 50x leverage for 175,000 ETH ( ETH ) worth $340 million. Due to the large liquidation amount, Hyperliquid was forced to absorb the position at $1,915 in an effort to liquidate it. As a result, Hyperliquid lost more than $4 million. Read more: Bybit CEO reacts to Hyperliquid ETH liquidation, questions DEXs guardrails

title: The Rise and Fall of $GOAT: A Cautionary Tale in the Crypto World
body: Once a prominent AI token shining in the sky, $GOAT has become a symbol of just how volatile the cryptocurrency market can be. Not long ago, $GOAT was riding high, crossing the $1 billion market cap, and looked to many like a serious contender for the pantheon of promising investments. Capturing the imagination of traders and investors alike, the token seemed like a one-way bet to the top. But in the space of about one month, it saw a staggering decline that set it tumbling to a mere $56.4 million market cap. What in the world happened? What catastrophic flip of the switch brought about this most talkative token’s talkative demise? Will it even be remembered as a token, or will it only be remembered as a symbol of the unpredictable nature of the digital asset market? Bottom line: Can we hedge against the risk of holding tokens for the long term? The Rise: A Token on the Verge of Greatness At its peak, $GOAT was among the rare tokens on the Pumfun exchange that had successfully crossed the $1 billion mark for market capitalization. It had all the elements for success: a name you couldn’t forget, a link to cutting-edge AI technology, and the sheer excitement that propels crypto prices to new records. If anything, $GOAT’s status as a “memecoin” only enhanced its profile. The token raked in huge amounts of attention from investors rushing to assemble portfolios of AI-driven assets. The coin stirred excitement from the outset. For a long time, it looked as if it were an inevitable upward path, with the crypto recovering from downward corrections to soaring heights that seemed more guaranteed with each passing day. The $GOAT token was no exception. Its Friday high price looked more than likely to realize another weekend run not seen in this space for months. And with the promise of an NFT drop possibly today, the topaz coin that works with the Ethereum smart contract seemingly found a historical moment for propelling itself to even further heights. The Fall: A Sudden and Harsh Decline Yet again, we see that in the crypto world, there are no extended good times. Suddenly and harshly, $GOAT has begun to move in the opposite direction, and its current value is a shadow of what it once was. Today, we find it at a market cap of just $56.4 million, after a drop that has left just about no one touched with a warm, fuzzy feeling. $GOAT once a shining star among AI tokens One of the few coins on Pumfun to cross the $1B marketcap is now a shadow of its former self. Goat is now at $56.4M and has lost about 95.65% of its value. Holders count is presently at 88,394 and sol liquidity is worth $1.27M meaning… pic.twitter.com/ufvCz3crup — Stalkchain (@StalkHQ) March 14, 2025 That’s a heart-stopping, gut-wrenching drop of 95.65% since the only time it was ever worth more. $GOAT didn’t go down quickly but rather fell, and that falling is a wake-up call for folks in the crypto world. Goats don’t stay on top for long. They climb high and then come down fast. Whatever $GOAT’s actual price is (or was), it appeared to some (and surely to many $GOAT holders) that the price reflected a rocket on the rise. Then it looked like a mountain when it was really just a hill. When it went over the top, then it came down and down and down to where we are now. And what are we now? We are not on top of the GOAT. The GOAT is falling.Maconline.com keeps saying so. When the GOAT’s falling, crypto’s going with it. And when is crypto not going with it? That’s another question. One critical factor behind the collapse of $GOAT is its dwindling liquidity. With only $1.27 million in liquidity and 88,394 holders, the marketplace for $GOAT is extremely shallow. That limited liquidity makes it hard for investors to sell their stakes without meaningfully moving the price—and when that happens, it really does feel like the thing is collapsing, and it starts to look like there’s not much in the way of support, which of course invites more selling. A Lesson Learned: Trading vs. Holding Long-Term Key lessons messaged by the demise of $GOAT: Crypto trading can be more profitable than HODLing (holding long term). This is especially true for tokens that lack strong fundamentals. In the space of crypto KOLs (key opinion leaders), there’s mostly a vibe of profiting on the short-term ups and downs of the market. Holding tends to be viewed as a short way of saying “dumb strategies.” And trading, of course, isn’t risk-free. Although it can be a rewarding strategy for some, holding has significant risks. Tokens such as $GOAT, which have none of the fundamental strength that a development team, a set of solid partnerships, or a useful presence in the real world might provide, are particularly vulnerable to the kinds of wild and unsustainable price swings that we saw in the last bull run and that some of us might hope never to see again. Given those price swings and the missed opportunities they represent, you might wonder why anyone would even think about holding for the long term. It is most important to evaluate the fundamentals behind any project if you are an asset holder. Look closely at these elements: – Use case: Does the project have strong, demonstrated use cases? – Team: Is the project team credible? – Partnerships: Are there partnerships in place that could drive significant value, or at least some value, to this project? It’s clear that determining the answers to these questions is essential if you want to stand a chance of picking a cryptocurrency that will exist, in any form, five years from now. To summarize, the collapse of $GOAT reminds us of the risks we take in the cryptocurrency market. When you invest in crypto, you have the chance to see huge profits, but there’s also a real possibility that you’ll lose it all. If you’re going to play in this space, first understand that the trends we see often don’t last long. Second, have confidence in either what you’re trading or what you’re holding for the long term—because in crypto, nothing is guaranteed. Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. Always do your research before buying any cryptocurrency or investing in any services. title: Beosin Reveals Suspicious Price Manipulation of $SHELL Token by Market Makers
body: A comprehensive on-chain analysis carried out by Beosin, a prominent blockchain security and auditing firm, has shed light on a number of dubious dealings afoot in the world of the $SHELL token. Beosin’s sleuthing has revealed what could well be potential price manipulation schemes, and they’ve connected the dots to market makers and certain addresses that seem to be linked to @myshell_ai. What’s more, Beosin Trace says these transactions were intimately tied to some very significant price swings experienced by the $SHELL token itself. The series of large transfers of $SHELL tokens between different addresses are analyzed here. Multiple transfers to hot wallets associated with major crypto exchanges are numerous. Most of those transfers and many of the occurrences seem to be part of a coordinated effort to attack the price of the token before it is listed. This heist raises some serious questions about the market conditions leading up to the listing. The Suspicious Transactions Behind $SHELL’s Price Surge One of Beosin’s most alarming findings is that more than $1 million worth of $SHELL tokens was transferred just minutes before the token was listed on Binance Spot. Beosin’s Trace report states that at 19:08:19 on February 27, 2025 (UTC+8), Address 2, linked to @myshell_ai, sent 1,538,462 $SHELL tokens to a user at a Binance address, valued at around $1 million. This transfer happened some 112 minutes before the token’s official listing on Binance Spot, and it smells a lot like a last-minute pump before the token started trading. This suspicious transfer was not an isolated event. Between 20:19 and 20:40 (UTC+8) on the same day, Address 3 (0xf60b) and a Bitget hot wallet executed a series of transfers, moving a total of 5,829,159.2 $SHELL tokens—worth around $3.5 million—to another Binance user address. The timing and magnitude of these transactions raise concerns about the role of market makers in potentially orchestrating these moves to drive up the token’s price before its exchange debut. A Web of Transactions Linked to Major Exchanges The transactions under suspicion were not restricted to just a single day. They spanned multiple days and involved numerous complex components. On February 14, 2025, the Safe Wallet identified with @myshell_ai (0x45ca) made a transfer of 500,000 $SHELL tokens to a Bitget user address (0x31034fb4a5212994f1540ab7067f721f152421ac). This transfer was in two parts: 500,000 $SHELL tokens (Ethereum) and the same amount (500,000 $SHELL tokens), but this time, in the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) version. Now, the next day, on February 13, 2025, we find Address 3 (0xf60b) involved in different parts of a similar scheme: on this occasion, moving and then retransferring $SHELL tokens to and from various wallets such that, in the end, it appears that another 500,000 $SHELL tokens (again, both the Ethereum and BSC versions) were moved to nearly the same Bitget user address as in the earlier transaction. Moreover, Address 3 (0xf60b) sent an incredible 5 million $SHELL tokens to 0xc606, which, in turn, transferred 2.5 million of those tokens to 0x89fe. Then, on March 11, 0x89fe deposited 612,913.95 $SHELL tokens into another Bitget user address, 0xf8706f1e4c4502b7cc5eb1b6140f6de5324e2bd4. These trades done by different addresses controlled by the same user, done right before $SHELL is listed on exchanges, make a very compelling case that these market makers were the ones that moved the price up before exchanges listed $SHELL. 1/ Beosin has released an insightful on-chain analysis of $Shell to reveal suspicious token price manipulation by market makers. Here is an easy-to-understand thread of it pic.twitter.com/49QF9vAxMn — Beosin Web3 Security & Compliance (@Beosin_com) March 15, 2025 Implications for the $SHELL Token and the Broader Crypto Market Beosin’s analysis of $SHELL’s price manipulation spotlights a potentially troubling trend of market manipulation using coordinated token transfers. The actions uncovered in the report demonstrate how market makers can use their control over token movements and access to large exchanges to pump up the price of a token before its public listing. The exposure of these dubious activities could injure the $SHELL token’s reputation and trust in the market. Even let us say that it had a beautiful rise in value following its initial exchange listings. The overall market is so jittery right now that any hint of negative news can lead to a price drop, let alone a surge in apparent token value that is based on good ol’ fashioned manipulation. This incident additionally provokes wider worries about how vulnerable the crypto space is to market manipulation. As cryptocurrencies increasingly become part of the global financial system, the necessity for regulatory oversight and, even more so, transparency in token listings is becoming more evident. This is especially true for tokens that are associated with larger blockchain projects, where any kind of market manipulation that happens can have a larger overall effect on the crypto space. The Role of Blockchain Auditing Firms in Enhancing Market Integrity To counteract the increasing dangers associated with token manipulation, blockchain security companies, such as Beosin, are vital for the fortification of market integrity. Thanks to their careful, on-chain investigations, they are able to pinpoint not just dubious behaviors but also potential weaknesses that exist within the market itself. Thus, they are a big part of making the greater crypto ecosystem a safer space for all involved. The crypto market is growing up and finding its place in the financial world. As it matures, it’s likely to attract the same level of scrutiny that traditional financial markets do—especially when it comes to possibly illegal activities like market manipulation. This week, the crypto forensic firm Beosin published a report about just how much manipulation (in terms of deceiving honest investors) still goes on in the crypto space, even as this supposedly largely lawless sector has been cleaned up a bit since last year. Beosin’s report is a good reminder that anything on a blockchain is not necessarily always above board. To sum up, Beosin’s recent on-chain analysis shines a light on possibly illegal or unethical goings-on with the $SHELL token’s price. The analysis, part of Beosin’s ongoing coverage of intriguing tokens, underlines the importance of knowing what’s really going on with a token before, say, buying it or putting it in a DeFi protocol. Indeed, the investigation found that the people buying the $SHELL token weren’t really buying something that was worth what they were paying. And some of those people might have been using the $SHELL token to pay for something other than the right to buy that token. Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. Always do your research before buying any cryptocurrency or investing in any service. title: Ripple News: John Deaton Shuts Down False Claims About XRP in State-Level Payments
body: The post Ripple News: John Deaton Shuts Down False Claims About XRP in State-Level Payments appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Recently, rumors spread that the U.S. SEC had clarified how different cryptocurrencies might be used within the U.S. government. It was said that XRP could be used for state-level financial transactions and optimizing government payments, ADA for academic credentialing, smart contracts for government services, and secure infrastructure, and SOL for high-speed blockchain applications like secure voting and digital identity management. However, these rumors were quickly shot down by the founder of CryptoLaw and pro-XRP lawyer, who clarified on social media that the SEC had not released any such information. EVERYONE: The @SECGov did not release any such thing. https://t.co/PbRoMZbe6A — John E Deaton (@JohnEDeaton1) March 14, 2025 The rumors came just after U.S. President Donald Trump signed an executive order to create a strategic reserve of cryptocurrencies using tokens already owned by the government. The order sparked interest in the market, as Trump named Bitcoin, Ether, XRP, Solana, and Cardano as the digital assets expected to be included in the reserve. However, the market was left disappointed after the announcement, as many were hoping for a concrete plan to buy new tokens. On March 7, President Donald Trump hosted a meeting with crypto executives at the White House for the first-ever Crypto Summit. During the summit, Trump and other cabinet officials met with key figures from the crypto industry to show continued support for the sector and gather ideas for future regulation and legislation. This event followed Trump’s recent Executive Order, which announced the creation of a federal Bitcoin reserve. However, when Trump first mentioned the idea earlier, there were concerns that he might raise taxes to buy crypto and that including smaller, more volatile coins like Cardano and XRP could pose risks.

title: PAAL AI Partners with CryptoAutos to Revolutionize Luxury Car Transactions with Web3 Technology
body: PAAL AI, a top provider of cutting-edge artificial intelligence solutions, has declared its most recent integration with CryptoAutos, a platform that focuses on the sale and purchase of high-end automobiles. The partnership will allow for direct and seamless payments in $PAAL, the native token of the PAAL ecosystem, for the kinds of transactions CryptoAutos is known for, all while taking us one large step forward in the ongoing convergence of AI, Web3, and real-world assets (RWA). As the automotive market rapidly embraces digital solutions, the partnership between PAAL AI and CryptoAutos paves an exhilarating new avenue for the buyers and sellers of luxury vehicles to interact. With the integration now complete, CryptoAutos has given platform users a custom experience that harnesses the potent features of PAAL AI, such as its facility with AI-powered customer assistance and personalized car recommendations. As if that weren’t enough, PAAL AI has now created a custom bot for Telegram that enables the community users of CryptoAutos to interact in seamless fashion. We now stand at the threshold of an era where AI and blockchain technology can work together to create a buying and selling experience that is intuitive, safe, and efficient. Streamlining Luxury Car Transactions with AI and Blockchain At the cusp of entwining the blockchain technology with the luxury vehicle market is CryptoAutos, which now offers the ability to make purchases and sales of high-end cars using digital currencies like $PAAL. The partnership with PAAL AI, on the other hand, could take this company to the next level and edify the user experience with artificial intelligence (AI). CryptoAutos could become even more personalized, with AI helping to make the car-buying process not only more efficient but, one might hope, enjoyable as well. One of the key features enabled by the PAAL AI integration is the AI-powered customer assistance, which provides users with real-time support during the car-buying journey. Whether it’s answering questions, guiding users through the payment process, or offering tailored recommendations, the AI-driven assistance ensures that customers receive a seamless and hassle-free experience. Proud to collaborate w/ @CryptoAutos_ Integrating $PAAL payments into their cutting-edge platform! Get behind the wheel of luxury cars with $PAAL today. Crypto Autos is an innovative project that combines the world of cryptocurrency with the automotive industry, aiming to… https://t.co/DSYCJEgAQ0 — PAAL AI (@PaalMind) March 12, 2025 Furthermore, the automated luxury car recommendations function uses advanced algorithms to analyze user preferences and suggest vehicles that align with their specific tastes and needs. This ensures that buyers can find their ideal car with minimal effort. Yet another fascinating aspect of the PAAL AI integration is the custom Telegram bot built exclusively for the CryptoAutos community. Telegram is one of the most popular messaging platforms among cryptocurrency’s many fans and businesses, and the CryptoAutos bot will be a crucial interface for engaging with our platform. Be it for customer support, user transactions, or simply engaging with the latest platform developments—such as our recent on-platform rebranding—the bot will be an unobtrusive and seamless way for our users to buy and sell in the decentralized marketplace. A New Chapter for AI, Web3, and Real-World Assets The collaboration of PAAL AI and CryptoAutos marks a big step in combining AI, Web3, and real-world assets. As the blockchain and cryptocurrency businesses push into new sectors, they appear unable to stop invading the old marketplace. Using digital tools, they claim to be revolutionizing the traditional sector, which is 4.0. In this revolution’s name, they promise to transform everything. In this partnership, PAAL AI and CryptoAutos appear to be delivering a new luxury vehicle transaction experience. In this integrated system, users can expect scope, services tailored to their individual needs, and heightened security when conducting significant business, like trading in exotic automobiles. Paying with $PAAL tokens—and, for that matter, with any number of traditional currency options—means that luxury car deals are now not only but also. For PAAL AI, this integration marks yet another step forward in establishing its place as a dominant force in the AI-driven blockchain space. The company has already made a splash with its innovative ecosystem, which lets users create customized AI bots that can be deployed across several different platforms. By reaching out into the automotive sector, PAAL AI shows how its technology can be applied to all kinds of complex problems in all sorts of industries it hasn’t yet touched. The Future of Luxury Car Sales in the Web3 Era The partnership between PAAL AI and CryptoAutos spotlights a nexus where Web3 and AI meet—one that revolves around the traditional, often arcane, world of high-end automotive sales. These are events where huge sums of money change hands; where the demands of vanity, ego, and simple overindulgence mix; where concerns about security and privacy are all the greater for the absence of any mechanisms that enforce either. So is your luxury vehicle sale happening on a blockchain? If not, why not? In the not-too-distant future, this union may very well serve as a model for other industries that are trying to figure out how to harness the still-emerging AI and blockchain technologies. Meanwhile, as large segments of the global economy continue their transformation into a digital one, the luxury carmakers are very much in the vanguard of benefiting from this wave of new tech. And of all the recent technological developments, the auto industry stands to gain the most in implementing AI to personalize the car-buying experience and the use of blockchain technology to streamline the experience. To sum up, the conjunction of PAAL AI with CryptoAutos marks a major event in the sphere of luxury vehicle transactions. It is the world of next-generation AI where this new partnership, founded on the principles of blockchain technology, lives and breathes. With these key innovations very much in mind, we take a look at this new strategic alliance and the seamless platform it offers to users for executing digital transactions of high-end vehicles. Plenty more to come in terms of potential synergies among the worlds of crypto, cars, and AI. Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. title: Is Coinbase’s Recent Dip the Right Time to Buy?
body: The leading U.S. cryptocurrency exchange, Coinbase (COIN), has seen its stock plunge nearly 50% from its all-time highs. Many investors are asking whether this is the right time to buy or if the company’s future is less certain than it once seemed. Despite the significant drop in price, the fundamentals behind Coinbase remain as strong as ever. The company continues to grow its product offerings, secure regulatory victories, and see increasing adoption by institutional investors. When we dissect the main influences on Coinbase’s performance, we find that the current downturn is likely not a direct outcome of any decisions made by the company, but more of a market reaction to some broader driving factors. In this piece, we’ll explore the motivations behind the recent sell-off, assess how well we think Coinbase is positioned for growth in the future, and then try to determine if this current dip is a valid buying opportunity. Why the Sell-Off? Coinbase’s share price has dropped sharply, but a closer look shows that it is not just Coinbase, but also Bitcoin that has seen dramatic drops. As Coinbase states, “Bitcoin (BTC) has fallen approximately 30% from its highs.” And from my close watch over the years, I would have to say that on a not quite constant but definitely close to a 1:1 ratio, when Bitcoin drops, not just Coinbase, but the whole cryptocurrency market suffers and Coinbase’s price drops as well. $COIN is down nearly 50% from its highs, but the fundamentals have never looked stronger. SEC case dropped. Institutional adoption rising. A growing crypto product suite. Is this the dip to buy? Let’s break it down. pic.twitter.com/aADywSc4iG — Nansen (@nansen_ai) March 14, 2025 Moreover, the revenue that Coinbase receives from crypto trading is exceedingly responsive to the market’s condition. Trading volumes are down across the board. As a result, Q1 revenue is expected to be 14% lower than the previous quarter. This drop in earnings coincides with a broader adverse market sentiment, and it’s undoubtedly also contributing to our downward trajectory in price. However, we aren’t pessimistic about this short-term weakness necessarily indicating something long-term unfavorable. After all, in the Coinbase crypto trajectory, the context is one of growth, not decline, and the regulatory backdrop is increasingly favorable. A Positive Regulatory Shift for Coinbase The recent regulatory victory with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is one of the most substantial factors impacting the long-term outlook for Coinbase. After extended periods of murkiness and legal hurdles, the SEC has abandoned its case against Coinbase. This unfurling of events has paved the way for the exchange to start listing more tokens and to expand its offerings quite significantly. The removal of this precipitative cloud associated with a very significant part of the weather regulator section of the report seems pretty important. It seems to be a turning point. In addition, Coinbase is no longer simply responding to the regulatory environment; it is actively shaping U.S. crypto policy. With a U.S. administration in place that is pro-crypto, the environment for centralized exchanges (CEXs) like Coinbase is improving. As the company works more closely with regulators and policymakers, it could emerge as a key player in establishing clearer, more supportive regulations for the whole crypto industry. That strategic shift appears to position Coinbase for continued growth as the regulatory landscape becomes more favorable. Strong Fundamentals and Future Growth Potential Even with the crypto markets experiencing short-term volatility, Coinbase’s fundamentals remain impressive. The company has margins that would make many tech stocks envious, with operating margins that hover around 40%. That number, of course, is pre-tax, and the taxes Coinbase would pay if it were not based in San Francisco would probably lower its margins. All that said, 40% is an incredibly high operating margin and a sign that Coinbase is doing something right. Nonetheless, it is important to point out that around 60% of Coinbase’s earnings still arrive courtesy of cryptocurrency trading. That kind of sustained burn means dealing with a highly unstable crypto market, where low trading volumes in a bad quarter can be pretty much offset by higher trading volumes when the next bad quarter rolls around. Conversely, if good quarters become the new normal, then Coinbase has upside in terms of not just trading volumes but also increased revenues through what might be called its new normal windfall. Considering crypto trading, Coinbase isn’t merely an exchange to trade in digital currencies. It is broadening its product offerings, and by doing so is very much a player in the emerging industry of tokenized assets. From what they tell us, the audience for these products ranges from retail and individual investors to institutional players, with the latter being a much bigger audience than anyone thought possible just a few years ago. Is Now the Right Time to Buy? Because the market is undervaluing Coinbase’s long-term growth potential in the face of some short-term volatility, the current price could be a very attractive entry point for investors who are willing to risk a bet. Coinbase is leading in the adoption of cryptocurrencies by both retail and institutional investors. As the cryptocurrency market matures, Coinbase’s place among core, financial-platform providers for digital assets becomes clearer. Although every investment carries some danger, and especially in the volatile world of cryptocurrency, the recent dip in Coinbase’s stock price could give a false impression of the company’s overall health. The following three factors indicate that not only is Coinbase likely to make it through the current turbulence, it’s also in a prime position to come out stronger on the other side than it was before. To conclude, Coinbase’s fundamentals look better than ever, and the company’s recent win with regulators and its push for much wider adoption of crypto signal a bright future to us. The current market may be selling off, and it may be a painful experience in the short term for long-term investors, but it could just be the buy signal in a company we see as central to the future of finance. Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. Always do your research before buying any cryptocurrency or investing in any service. Follow us on Twitter @nulltxnews to stay updated with the latest Crypto, NFT, AI, Cybersecurity, Distributed Computing, and Metaverse news !

title: BNB Price Can Hit Fresh ATH As Mubarak Leads Meme Coin Frenzy
body: BNB price is up by 3.57% today despite the broader crypto market consolidation while eyeing fresh all-time high levels above $750. The investor sentiment has improved as the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) records a massive surge in the meme coin activity led by Mubarak. As a result, the DEX volumes on BSC has reached a record high surpassing Solana. BNB Price Jumps 4.5% Eyes Fresh All time Highs Following the current development, the BNB price has shot up by 4.5% today while the broader crypto market is facing consolidation.At press time, BNB was trading at $628 with daily trading volume surging 21% to $1.75 billion. As per the Coinglass data , the BNB futures open interest is also up by 10.72% to $875 million, suggesting a bullish outlook among traders. Binance Coin or BNB price has broken out of a descending channel pattern on the 4-hour timeframe, according to crypto analyst Pro Crypto Signals. “If BNB sustains its position above the channel structure, it could rally toward $720 in the coming days,” the analyst noted. Source: Pro Crypto Signals However, for a strong rally ahead, the BNB price needs to break past the crucial resistance of $630. This will set the stage for a major rally to the fresh all-time highs of $720, and beyond. Additionally, last week’s reports also suggest that the Trump family is eyeing a stake in Binance.US. However, Changpeng Zhao dismissed the rumors very soon stating that the WSJ article has been putting misleading information. BNB Chain Surpasses Solana In DEX Trading Volume Over the last 24 hours, the decentralized exchange (DEX) trading volume on BNB Chain has crossed an impressive $1.64 billion, surpassing Solana to grab the top spot. he surge was largely driven by memecoins like Mubarak. SourcE: LookonChain PancakeSwap, the leading DEX on BNB Chain, also emerged as the platform with the highest trading volume within the same period, solidifying its dominance in the DeFi space. This highlights the growing activity and interest in the BNB Chain ecosystem, fueled by memecoin trading and decentralized finance innovations. Mubarak Meme Coin Jumps 71% The Mubarak meme coin has rallied by 71% in the last 24 hours on reports that Binance founder Changpeng Zhao has purchased $600 worth of the meme coin. As of press time, the meme coin is trading at $0.1304 with daily trading volumes at $123 million. On the other hand, many early investors reaped substantial profits. For example, Lookonchain recently revealed that one trader earned over $521,000 in profit by investing in MUBARAK. title: BSC DEX Volume Surpasses Solana—Will This Benefit BNB Price to Reach $700?
body: The post BSC DEX Volume Surpasses Solana—Will This Benefit BNB Price to Reach $700? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The crypto markets remained sluggish throughout the weekend without massive price actions, while the rise in the BTC price raised optimism. In the meantime, BinanceCoin has gained the spotlight, recording decent gains compared to the other top 10 cryptos. The token has attracted more than 11% gains in the past seven days and nearly 5% in the past 24 hours. With the rise above $630 and a notable increase of over 25% in trading volume, the BNB price is expected to be the top performer among the large-cap cryptos in the upcoming days. BinanceSmart Chain TVL Surpass Solana BSC TVL is on the rise! In the past few months, the trading activity on Solana was extremely high. As a result, the platform surpassed the transaction volume, count, and TVL of popular chains like Ethereum. Meanwhile, BinanceSmart Chain (BSC) has surpassed Solana in terms of DEX volume and ranked first. Source: DefiLlama One of the reasons for the rapid increase is said to be an investment from Abu Dhabi-based MGX into Binance. Secondly, the sudden rise in the BSC-based tokens like Mubarak and Mashalla has also contributed to the BSC DEX volume. Once, Solana also experienced a similar rise, which faded with the drop of a couple of memecoin rug pulls. Therefore, with the rise of memecoin volume on BSC, there could be the possibility of another such event. How Will This Impact the BNB Price? BinanceCoin is known for its silent yet monstrous behavior, as it maintains a consistent rally without making a lot of noise. The price has risen to over $630 after rebounding from the lows close to $500. With this, the token is expected to break above the bearish pattern, which may help the BNB price to head towards new highs. As seen in the above chart, the BNB price broke down from the bullish pattern but remained within a descending parallel channel. Moreover, the 50-day and 200-day MAs underwent a bearish crossover, which is about to get reversed anytime from now. With this quick reversal, the price is expected to break the resistance of the descending channel and enter the rising parallel channel that it has held since August 2024. Meanwhile, the RSI is incremental, which suggests that bullish continuation could be imminent for the BinanceCoin (BNB) price for the week.

title: OKX Burns 31 Million OKB Tokens in Latest Strategic Deflationary Move
body: In an audacious attempt to cut down the number of its native tokens that are in circulation, the exchange OKX has announced this week that it has completed its latest token burn event. In this event, they burned 31.15 million OKB tokens. They say that this takes the total burned number of OKB tokens up to 171 million, which is an impressive-sounding number. As the overall crypto market seems to be facing an extended downturn, it seems that exchanges like OKX are trying to use token scarcity as a way to maintain their tokens’ prices. OKX completed its 27th OKB token burn on March 14, burning 31,158,862 OKB worth $1.32 billion—a record high in both quantity and total value. So far, OKB has cumulatively burned 171 million tokens, leaving 129 million in circulation, for a 57.10% burn ratio. OKX previously stated… — Wu Blockchain (@WuBlockchain) March 14, 2025 Implementing systematic burns of OKB is a key part of OKX’s strategy for managing supply and demand. This is unique to cryptocurrency exchanges, as most traditional financial markets cannot impact their asset’s supply like this. And under current regulatory scrutiny, most wouldn’t even attempt. Yet crypto exchanges can and do. They have a vested interest in ensuring that their tokens maintain value. And this is what makes the current strategy of OKX potentially harmful to both users and the larger market. Token Burns: A Deflationary Strategy to Combat Declining Spot Volumes OKX’s latest burn event comes at a time when spot trading volumes are declining across the major cryptocurrency exchanges. Conditions in the market are tough, buffeted by forces that are both global economic and long-term in nature, and a number of exchanges have been exploring user engagement ideas in an attempt to stop their partial vaporization. OKX has been implementing ideas to engage users, offering the chance to win the equivalent of $30,000 in Tether (USDT) as a carrot to keep its customers around for the kind of token burns that would partially inflate the value of the exchange’s ERC-20 token. These periodic burns create the illusion of scarcity, a tactic that can drive speculation and attract more investors. However, critics argue that while the short-term effects of such burns may be noticeable, the long-term impact on the overall value of a token remains uncertain. The burn strategy essentially works by buying back loyalty from token holders, particularly when the market sentiment is low and trading volumes are down. In times of low demand and declining prices, token burns act as a form of market manipulation—creating an artificial sense of value while the underlying fundamentals of the exchange and its offerings may not have changed drastically. These worries notwithstanding, token burns have established themselves as a useful tool in the crypto toolbox. For many projects that issue tokens, the act of burning those tokens is a way to create some short-term price action—positive price action, we should say—that keeps interest in the token alive even when the broader market is not so great. By reducing the total supply and keeping that even lower number in the public’s mind, these projects maintain the appearance of scarcity. OKX’s Ongoing Commitment to Deflationary Economics OKX has carried out numerous burn events over the years, with the most recent being just one among many. Through periodic burns, the exchange has eliminated a total of 171 million OKB tokens from circulation, showing a clear and sustained commitment to deflationary economics. This use of deflationary aspects in the perceived value of the native token aligns with a broader trend among crypto exchanges and projects seeking ways to increase the value of their tokens, attract new users, and retain existing ones amid uncertain market conditions. This strategy has its risks, as it can cause volatility and create a dependence on shifting short-term token prices. But for exchanges like OKX, which thrive on user engagement and participation, it’s an effective way to prop up token value in a bear market. And this approach fits well into the broader cryptocurrency narrative: if you can’t have it, you must want it. OKX and its rivals are in a space where they need to keep users close and keep them participating. Lopping off a sliver of a token here or there might do the trick in the short term—but it is, by far, not the most desirable method. Although the long-term effects of these token burns might not be fully realized yet, they are assuredly part of a large wave of efforts by cryptocurrency exchanges to raise the value of their tokens in the current bear market. They utilize them as deflationary mechanisms to try to create uppercase V, uppercase A, uppercase L, uppercase U, uppercase E in the eyes of anyone looking at their ecosystem—an utterly essential strategy when the overall market is looking sick. The Role of Exchanges in the Token Economy The most recent token burn from OKX emphasizes how much power cryptocurrency exchanges now wield over their native tokens. In traditional finance, there are laws that prevent companies from messing too much with supply and demand; otherwise, they’d just be burning money and creating inflation. But in crypto, it’s a different story. Exchanges can kind of do what they want with their native tokens, and they might as well use the tools at their disposal to make those tokens more appealing to buy and hold. That’s what OKX’s latest token burn seems to indicate. This power allows exchanges to control their tokenomics and create an environment where the value of their tokens can be manipulated to some degree. That kind of environment is especially valuable in a bear market when sentiment is otherwise hard to come by. While the long-term effects of these deflationary measures are yet to be fully understood, they are undoubtedly influencing the way that exchanges interact with their user bases and manage the economic forces that impact their tokens. To conclude, the 27th event of OKX’s token burn offers clear proof that exchanges are ramping up the use of deflationary strategies to influence the supply and demand of their tokens. By burning what constitutes a relatively large portion of its OKB supply, this exchange is propelling the demand and maintaining the value of its native token, all while market conditions are less than favorable for cryptocurrencies. Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. Always do your research before buying any cryptocurrency or investing in any service. title: XRP Gains Major Recognition as U.S. and Dubai Embrace Ripple’s Digital Asset
body: In a groundbreaking move for the cryptocurrency industry, the SEC has now gone a step further to declare XRP as a “Strategic Asset for the U.S.” This appears to set the stage for a new era of digital asset integration, with the U.S. government now planning a pilot program to figure out the best way to use XRP within some of the most vital financial systems. According to the SEC document, XRP will not only serve in these pilot programs but also may wind up playing a key role in a ton of” core financial activities” in the U.S., such as tax refunds and social security, thereby becoming more integrated than ever into the U.S. financial infrastructure. Besides the increasing acceptance in the U.S., Ripple, the company behind XRP, has also received a substantial international boost. The Dubai Financial Services Authority (DFSA) has given Ripple the thumbs-up to provide cryptographic payment and service solutions that use XRP in the region. These developments represent a watershed for both Ripple and the larger crypto industry. While some jurisdictions have grown shy about cryptocurrencies, XRP seems to be gaining traction in many international locales. XRP’s Role as a Strategic Asset in U.S. Financial Systems The recent SEC document, which officially designates XRP as a “Strategic Asset,” represents a major shift in the U.S. government’s view of cryptocurrencies. As part of this new initiative, the U.S. is set to launch a pilot program that aims to integrate XRP into key financial services, such as tax refunds and social security payments. This could have a huge ripple effect, as it would be a clear signal from the U.S. government that it is ready to use a digital asset in place of the dollars it normally uses to make such payments. BREAKING: The SEC posts $XRP document to website naming it as a 'Strategic Asset for the U.S." The documents states that the U.S. will begin a pilot program to use $XRP for tax refunds and Social Security Integrations pic.twitter.com/GRlCugkgLy — CryptosRus (@CryptosR_Us) March 14, 2025 Including XRP in these pilot programs suggests that the potential benefits of digital currencies—namely, that they can help create faster, cheaper, and more efficient systems of payment—are something the U.S. government is bullish on. As we head into tax season, it’s likely that the pilot program will test the viability of XRP as a tool to facilitate tax refunds. From what we understand, the idea is to see if the currency can be used to send refunds in a way that is more streamlined and timely than what we’re currently doing. Also, could XRP be used to strengthen the systems that deliver social security payments? In a conversation with Ripple, I learned that using XRP for that purpose is something the company thinks can and should be done. This is a triumph for Ripple in its still-ongoing effort to create a bridge between the traditional financial system and blockchain technology. As more and more government entities look into using blockchain for public services, XRP stands to become a major tool in digital transformation within the public sector. Ripple Expands Reach with Dubai Approval XRP’s global acceptance extends well beyond the United States. Recently, the Ripple Network received a major regulatory green light from the Dubai Financial Services Authority (DFSA), allowing the company to offer cryptocurrency payments and services using XRP in the Dubai International Financial Centre (DIFC). This development adds to the sense that Ripple is fast becoming a worldwide financial player. Dubai has emerged as a worldwide nexus of blockchain innovation and in mid-2020 established a favorable regulatory framework for cryptocurrencies. Those moves align with the emirate’s strategy of nurturing the digital economy. By then, Dubai had well established itself as a global hub for many kinds of fintech, and Ripple was in discussions with the Dubai International Financial Centre, or DIFC. Meanwhile, Ripple was trying to secure a combination of necessary licenses and approvals from key financial regulators to refurbish its expansion in that part of the world. This approval also means increasing acceptance of cryptocurrencies into the traditional financial system. As Ripple establishes its presence in the Middle East, it can help speed along the adoption of XRP and similar digital assets into public and private sector uses across the region. XRP’s Growing Popularity: New Milestones and Record Highs XRP is wowing the market. The total number of XRP addresses just hit an all-time high of 6.87 million. That suggests ever-growing interest in and adoption of the cryptocurrency. In turn, that milestone—by no means a guarantee of an imminent price increase—does appear to suggest that the very base of the XRP user community is expanding. This spike in XRP addresses is representative of a larger trend in the cryptocurrency ecosystem, where digital assets are gaining much more traction and becoming much more mainstream. Why is this much more attention being directed to XRP? Well, the reason is that people and businesses from all over the world are using XRP to make payments toward a dazzling array of ‘use cases.’ In response to this much greater use of the XRP Ledger, demand for the digital asset itself grows and grows. The SEC recognizes XRP as a strategic asset. It has approved XRP for use in U.S. government programs. Ripple’s expansion into Dubai is, in part, a move to gain a foothold in the Asia-Pacific market. With these developments, XRP is becoming an increasingly integral part of the global financial landscape. The total number of $XRP addresses just hit an all-time high of 6.87 million! pic.twitter.com/clpBtKiPkl — Ali (@ali_charts) March 13, 2025 As we see these developments, it is quite clear that XRP is no longer just another cryptocurrency in the market. We see growing regulatory acceptance, and we see increased adoption. XRP is quickly becoming a cornerstone of the future of digital payments and the global financial system. Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. Always do your research before buying any cryptocurrency or investing in any service.
